invite.selectPoolLabel: Choose a pool to invite to
invite.noPoolsFound: You are not a member of any pools
invite.noValidatorsFound: You are not nominating any validators
invite.sharePoolInviteDescription: Share this link to invite others to join this pool
invite.shareValidatorInviteDescription: Share this link to invite others to nominate these validators
invite.invitedToJoinPool: You've Been Invited to Join a Pool
invite.poolInviteDescription: Someone has invited you to join their nomination pool. Review the details below and join if you're interested.
invite.invitedToNominateSingle: You've Been Invited to Nominate a Validator
invite.invitedToNominateMultiple: You've Been Invited to Nominate {{count}} Validators
invite.validatorInviteDescription: Someone has invited you to nominate these validators. Review the details below and nominate if you're interested.
invite.alreadyInPool: You are already a member of a pool. You need to leave your current pool before joining a new one.
invite.alreadyNominatingThese: You are already nominating these validators.
invite.alreadyNominating: You are already nominating these validators.
invite.alreadyNominatingOthers: You are already nominating other validators. Continuing will replace your current nominations.
invite.errorFetchingPool: Error fetching pool details. The pool may not exist or there was a network issue.
invite.errorFetchingValidators: Error fetching validator details. There may be a network issue.
invite.connectWalletToNominate: Please connect a wallet to nominate validators.
invite.noCurrentNominations: You are not currently nominating any validators
invite.noValidatorsInUrlDescription: No validator addresses were found in the URL. Please make sure you have a valid invite link.
